Name: Boxplot, ggplot2
Example requests: Use ggplot2 to create a boxplot of hwy vs. class. Color by class. Add jitter.

Name: Distribution (D): Numers
Example requests: Show me the distribution of hwy.

Name: D: normality
Example requests: Is cty normally distributed?

Name: D: Categories
Example requests: Show me the distribution of class as a barchart.

Name: D: Categories, pie
Example requests: Create an pie chart based on  class.

Name: Relationship (R): Numbers-numbers
Example requests: Plot the relationship between hwy and cty

Name: R: Refined scatter plot
Example requests: Use ggplot2. Plot hwy vs. cty, colored by class. Change shape by drv. Change size by displ. Change x label to 'Highway mpg'.  Change y label to 'City mpg'. Change background to white.  Increase font for labels to 15. Remove all grids.

Name: R: Correlation coefficient
Example requests: Calculate the correlation coefficient of cty vs hwy. Repeat that after log transformation. Collect these results and show them.

Name: R: Numbers-categories
Example requests: Show me the relationship between hwy and class.

Name: R: Numbers-categories, density
Example requests: Only keep 4, 6, and 8 cylinders. Create a density plot of cty, colored by year. Split into panels with one column  by cyl.

Name: R: Numbers-categories, violin
Example requests: Create a violin plot of cty vs. class. Color by class. Add data points with jitter.

Name: R: Category-category
Example requests: Are drv and cyl independent?

Name: R: Category-category, plot
Example requests: Plot the combinations of drv and cyl.

Name: R: Category-category, mosaic
Example requests: Plot the combinations of drv and cyl as a mosaic plot.

Name: Multivariate (M): Correlation heatmap
Example requests: Create a correlation map of all the columns that contain numbers

Name: M: Hierarchical clustering
Example requests: Conduct hierarchical clustering.

Name: M: ANOVA
Example requests: Conduct ANOVA of log-transformed hwy by class and drv.

Name: M: Regression
Example requests: Build a regression model of hwy based on cyl, displ, drv, and class. Give me diagnostic plots.

Name: M: Neural network
Example requests: Build a neural network model to predict hwy based on displ, cyl, and class. Use the nnet package. Plot the distribution of residuals.

Name: Data analysis
Example requests: Calculate average cty by year and class. Then use ggplot2 to create a barplot of average mpg by class, colored by year. The bars for different years should be side by side.

Name: Convert data types
Example requests: Convert cyl as numeric and calculate its correlation coefficient with hwy.

Name: Data processing
Example requests: hwy and cty represent miles per gallon (MPG) on the highway and in the city, respectively. Only keep cars more efficient than 15 MPG, but less than 40, on the highway. Add 0.5 to city MPG for correction. Perform log transformation on city MPG. Raise highway MPG to the second power. Calculate correlation coefficient of  the two transformed variables.

Name: Data wrangling, base R
Example requests: The dataset contains information about cars. Remove everything after \"(\" in trans column. Remove cars labeled as 2seater in class. Define a new column called ratio by dividing hwy by cty. Use ggplot2 to plot ratio vs. hwy. Color by class. Change marker type by trans. Change marker size by cyl.

Name: Data wrangling, dplyr
Example requests: The dataset contains various about cars. First, use dplyr to prepare the data. Remove everything after \"(\" in trans column. Remove cars labeled as 2seater in class. Define a new column called ratio by dividing hwy by cty. Sort the cars by ratio, highest first. Second, use ggplot2 and the new data to plot ratio vs. hwy. Color by class. Change marker type by trans. Change marker size by cyl.

Name: Interactive plots
Example requests: Plot hwy vs. displ group by cyl. Make it interactive with ggplotly.

Name: Chinese, 中文
Example requests: 按class画hwy的箱线图。按class更改颜色。添加抖动。

Name: Spanish, En español
Example requests: Cree un diagrama de caja de hwy por class. Cambia de color por class. Añade nerviosismo.

Name: Japanese, 日本語
Example requests: classごとに hwy の箱ひげ図を作成します。classごとに色を変えます。ジッターを追加します。

Name: German, deutsche Sprache
Example requests: Verwenden Sie ggplot2, um einen Boxplot von hwy nach class zu erstellen. Farbe um class ändern. Jitter-Punkte hinzufügen

Name: French, Français
Example requests: Créez une boîte à moustaches de hwy par class. Changer de couleur par class. Ajoutez des points de gigue.

Name: Italian, Italiano
Example requests: Crea un boxplot di hwy di class. Varia colore di class. Aggiungi punti di jitter.

Name: Hindi, हिन्दी भाषा
Example requests: class द्वारा hwy का बॉक्सप्लॉट बनाने के लिए ggplot2 का उपयोग करें। class द्वारा भिन्न रंग। जिटर पॉइंट जोड़ें।

Name: Random numbers
Example requests: Generate 100 random numbers. Plot their distribution.

Name: Hierarchical tree
Example requests: Provide a demo for hierarchical clustering tree.

Name: Heat map
Example requests: Create a heatmap with hierarchical clustering tree.

Name: Ridge regression
Example requests: Provide a demo for ridge regression.

Name: PCA
Example requests: Create a matrix with 100 columns and 20 rows. Fill it with random numbers from the normal distribution. The mean is 1 for the first 10 rows, but 3 for the rest. Conduct PCA. Plot using the first two principal components.

Name: Map
Example requests: Create an world map.

Name: Map, US
Example requests: Create a US map.

Name: Bioinformatics, genes
Example requests: Use the biomaRt package to retrieve all human genes on Chr.Y.

Name: Bioinformatics, position
Example requests: Use the biomaRt package to retrieve the gene symbol, the start and end position of all human genes on Chr.Y.

Name: Bioinformatics, length
Example requests: Use the biomaRt package to retrieve the gene symbol, the start and end position of all human genes on Chr.Y. Calculate the length as the absolute difference between the start and end positions. Create a density plot of the length after log10 transformation.

Name: Financial, stocks
Example requests: Retrieve and plot the stock price of Apple in 2022. Add 20 day moving average.

Name: Distribution, cut
Example requests: Plot the distribution of cut using a pie chart.

Name: Distribution, price
Example requests: Plot the distribution of price after log transformation.

Name: Scatter, price vs. carat
Example requests: Plot price vs. carat. Change color by clarity.

Name: Combinations
Example requests: Plot the combinations of cut and clarity.

Name: Modelling
Example requests: Remove diamonds larger than 3 carat. Build a model of price vs. carat. Create a violin plot of the residuals by clarity. Limit ploting to -10000 to 10000.

Name: Total Counts
Example requests: Plot the column sums.

Name: Boxplot, raw
Example requests: Create a bloxplot of all columns.

Name: Boxplot, log
Example requests: Add 1 to all numbers and then conduct log transformation. Create a bloxplot of all columns.

Name: Heatmap of variable genes
Example requests: Each row represents a gene. Each column is a sample. Remove genes with sum less than 10. Add 1 to all numbers. Log transform using base 2. Rank genes by standard deviations in descending order. Convert data as matrix. Subtract row means from all rows. Create a heatmap of the top 50 genes using red and green colors.

Name: DESeq2
Example requests: Each row represents a gene. Each column is a sample. Remove rows with sum less than 10. Then use DESeq2 to identify differentially expressed genes. The first three columns are control samples. The last three are mutant. Show me the numbers of up and down-regulated genes based on FDR < 0.05 and log fold change > 1 or less than -1.
